name: Mandi
description: Mandi is known as the 'Varanasi of Hills' due to its numerous ancient temples. The district is famous for its cultural heritage, scenic beauty, and the International Mandi Shivratri Fair.

locations.name: Rewalsar Lake
locations.description: Rewalsar Lake is a sacred lake surrounded by Buddhist, Hindu, and Sikh shrines. It's known for its spiritual significance and natural beauty.

travelTips.bestTime: March to June and September to November
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Mandi

locations.name: Prashar Lake
locations.description: Prashar Lake is a high-altitude lake surrounded by snow-capped mountains. It's known for its floating island and ancient temple.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Trekking required, can hire local guides

locations.name: Bhutnath Temple
locations.description: Bhutnath Temple is one of the oldest temples in Mandi, known for its architectural beauty and religious significance. It's the center of the famous Shivratri fair.

travelTips.transportation: Walking distance from Mandi bus stand
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple options available in Mandi town

locations.name: Joginder Nagar
locations.description: Joginder Nagar is a scenic town known for its hydroelectric project and beautiful gardens. It offers various adventure activities and nature trails.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: March to June

travelTips.bestTime: March to June for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Mandi

locations.name: Sundernagar
locations.description: Sundernagar is a beautiful town known for its lake and ancient temples. It's a perfect destination for nature lovers and spiritual seekers.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: October to March

travelTips.bestTime: October to March for comfortable weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - ATMs available in town
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Mandi
